SELECT SQL_CALC_FOUND_ROWS * FROM project
name like CONCAT('%',#{name},'%') and
approved_fund >= #{fund1} and
approved_fund <= #{fund2} and
approved_fund between #{fund1} and #{fund2} and
limit #{pageStart},#{pageEnd}; SELECT FOUND_ROWS() as count;

SELECT SQL_CALC_FOUND_ROWS p.* FROM project p ,project_member m
name like CONCAT('%',#{name},'%') and
approved_fund >= #{fund1} and
approved_fund <= #{fund2} and
approved_fund between #{fund1} and #{fund2} and m.organization_id=#{organization_id} and m.type='project' and m.reference_id=p.id
limit #{pageStart},#{pageEnd}; SELECT FOUND_ROWS() as count;

SELECT SQL_CALC_FOUND_ROWS p.* FROM project p ,project_member m
name like CONCAT('%',#{name},'%') and
approved_fund >= #{fund1} and
approved_fund <= #{fund2} and
approved_fund between #{fund1} and #{fund2} and m.username=#{username} and m.type='project' and m.reference_id=p.id
limit #{pageStart},#{pageEnd}; SELECT FOUND_ROWS() as count;
